radiographic_examinations.findings: Abnormal low T1-weighted and T2-weighted signal and high STIR signal of the T7 vertebral body.
Loss of the normal trabecular pattern of the T7 vertebra but no cortical destruction.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Showed an expansile lesion with possible sclerotic margins.

radiographic_examinations.findings: High metabolic activity in the T7 vertebra; other vertebrae were normal.
